name: Border Patrol- Airport Officer
description:
We explain the life of the airport security officer, who works at the airport and enjoy the life of security police and stop smuggling of illegal things that are transfer from one country to another country in airport games. This airport security police explain the challenging life of security and scan all bags to search illegal goods. Check all illegal goods like drugs, Gold, Black money and arrest the criminals.

**Key Features**
• A lot of fun in airport security game
• Stop smuggling of illegal items on airport
• Perfect simulator with smooth control and fun levels
• Smuggler items detection skills and much more
• Thrilling multiple missions for airport security
